pages.about: Encore Las Vegas About Us: Luxury Gaming Redefined Encore Las Vegas Home About Us Contacts Home About Us Contacts Discover Encore Las Vegas OUR STORY OF LUXURY AND INNOVATION Welcome to Encore Las Vegas, a beacon of sophistication and exhilaration nestled in the heart of Las Vegas. Since our grand opening in 2010, we have set the standard for luxury gaming and hospitality in one of the world's most vibrant cities. Our establishment is a testament to the vision of our founders, who sought to create an unparalleled experience that combines the thrill of gaming with the comfort and elegance of a world-class hotel. At Encore Las Vegas, we believe in offering our guests an escape into a world of luxury and possibility. Our story begins with the dream of building not just a casino, but a destination that stands out for its commitment to excellence, innovation, and the highest standards of service. From the majestic architecture that greets you upon arrival to the meticulous attention to detail in our accommodations, dining options, and gaming facilities, every aspect of Encore Las Vegas is designed to enchant and entertain. Over the years, we have continuously evolved, embracing the latest technologies and trends to ensure that our guests enjoy nothing but the best. Our casino floor features a wide array of games, from timeless classics to the latest innovations, catering to both seasoned players and newcomers alike. Meanwhile, our hotel offers a variety of luxurious rooms and suites, each crafted to provide an oasis of comfort and tranquility amidst the excitement of Las Vegas. Our dedicated team is the heart and soul of Encore Las Vegas. From our expert chefs and casino dealers to our attentive concierge service, everyone here is committed to making your stay memorable. We take pride in our ability to create personalized experiences for our guests, whether you're here to savor the thrill of the game, explore the wonders of Las Vegas, or simply unwind in opulence. As we look to the future, Encore Las Vegas remains devoted to innovation, excellence, and the endless pursuit of creating unforgettable moments for our guests. We invite you to join us and become a part of our story, where luxury meets excitement and dreams become reality. Welcome to Encore Las Vegas, where every visit is a journey beyond the ordinary. EncoreLasVegas.com Encore Las Vegas stands as the epitome of luxury in the heart of Downtown Las Vegas, offering an unparalleled experience for all. Whether you're visiting for the first time or returning as a cherished guest, our establishment is designed to leave a lasting impression with its distinctive blend of elegance and excitement. pages.contact: Encore Las Vegas Contact: Reach Out for Luxury Service Encore Las Vegas Home About Us Contacts Home About Us Contacts Connect With Encore Las Vegas WE'RE HERE TO ASSIST YOU At Encore Las Vegas, your feedback and inquiries are invaluable to us as we strive to enhance your experience and cater to your needs with exceptional service. Whether you have questions about your stay, need more information about our casino and entertainment options, or simply wish to share your experiences, we are here to listen and assist. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us through any of our communication channels. Our dedicated team is available around the clock to ensure your queries are addressed promptly and efficiently. For reservations, special requests, or further information about our facilities and services, you can contact us via email at EncoreLasVegas@gmail.com, or by phone at +1 702 770-7000. For a more personal touch, visit us at our physical address in the heart of Las Vegas, where our reception staff will be delighted to assist you in person. Follow us on our social media platforms for the latest updates and offerings from Encore Las Vegas. We look forward to hearing from you and welcoming you to an unparalleled experience at Encore Las Vegas. Your use of the site and your reliance on any information on the site is solely at your own risk. External Links Disclaimer Our website may contain links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by or in any way affiliated with Encore Las Vegas. Please note that Encore Las Vegas does not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites. Gaming and Betting Risks Encore Las Vegas offers casino and betting services; however, it is important to be aware of the financial risks involved. Betting and gambling can be addictive and can lead to significant financial loss. We encourage responsible gaming and recommend that all players adhere to their personal limits. Liability Disclaimer Under no circumstance shall we have any liability to you for any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of the use of the site or reliance on any information provided on the site. Your use of the site and your reliance on any information on the site is solely at your own risk. Contact Us For any further clarification regarding this disclaimer or any related matters, please do not hesitate to contact us through our Contact page. pages.policy: Encore Las Vegas Privacy Policy: Your Privacy Matters Encore Las Vegas Home About Us Contacts Home About Us Contacts Encore Las Vegas Privacy Policy SAFEGUARDING YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION At Encore Las Vegas, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our guests and website visitors. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to ensure it is protected. Information Collection We collect information from you when you visit our site, make a reservation, sign up for our newsletter, or interact with our services. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. We also collect non-personal information such as browser type, time spent on the site, and pages visited to improve our service. Use of Information The information we collect is used to personalize your experience, improve our website, provide customer service, process transactions, and send periodic emails regarding your reservation or other services. We may also use your information to send you promotional material about new products, special offers, or other information which we think you may find interesting. Information Protection We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you place an order or enter, submit, or access your personal information. These measures include SSL technology to ensure that your data is encrypted and secure. Information Sharing Encore Las Vegas does not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information without your consent, except as necessary to provide the services requested by you or to comply with legal requirements. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. Your Consent By using our site, you consent to our privacy policy. If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page. Contacting Us If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy, you may contact us using the information provided on our Contact page. We value your privacy and are dedicated to protecting your information and providing a safe and welcoming experience at Encore Las Vegas. This policy is effective as of 23.02.2024.
